channel.description: Authorization code flow Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 513 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Implement authorization by grant type (Authorization code dimension): https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/implement-grant-type/authcode/ Page type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic. Such high-level overviews provide developers with a broad understanding of the system’s workings.
